name: Casanova: The Duel of the Black Rose
name_original: Casanova: The Duel of the Black Rose
description:
Casanova: The Duel of the Black Rose is an action-adventure game developed by Arxel Tribe. It came out on 01-10-2001. Wanadoo published the game.
You can play Casanova: The Duel of the Black Rose on PC.
